page.title: 02Tatworth School
page.content:
Tatworth School provides primary education for children aged between four and eleven years. The school celebrated its centenary in 1979 and is still housed in the original buildings.
The number of children has fluctuated dramatically during the school's history - in 1985 it has 170 in six classes, though numbers are dropping in common with schools all over the country (due to a drop in the birth rate).
Most children live in Tatworth and South Chard, with a small number coming from outside the village.
